Detailed Description

A node class. In order to efficiently traverse the nets from cell, it is better that this class has a direct pointers to Net instead of going through the pin. It may make the FM algorithm a little faster. However, it prohibits to reuse the netlist from other algorithms that require to follow the signal direction.
